attributes.action: I want to be the the champion of the Armed Forces and Emergency Services.
attributes.additional_details:
Those that know me and read this know that I am the person I am because of them.  I would hope that they would pass a little more about me forward to the people that they have elected to help with the petition with a hope that they will sign and continue the movement.

Boris Johnson has elected a mouthpiece to run his new Veterans Department, this is far from what is needed.  We have personnel that are no longer fit for service, but cannot afford to seek support as they need to work.
attributes.background:
Boris Johnson is to create Britain's first department for military veterans with a priority to end legal witch-hunt against troops.

There is much more to this it should be for all that serve under the rule of HMG foreign and domestic, Armed Forces and Emergency Services, no handouts but help.
